## Properties

| Property        | Attribute      | Description | Type               | Default                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| --------------- | -------------- | ----------- | ------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `borderColor`   | `border-color` | 雷达线颜色       | `string`           | `'#2E3F63'`                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| `fontSize`      | `font-size`    | 字体大小        | `number`           | `14`                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| `labelDataList` | --             | 角顶文案        | `string[]`         | `[     '选时',     '选股',     '配置',     '日内交易',     '风格把控',     '风控能力'   ]`                                                                                                                        |
| `points`        | `points`       | 背景色以及分值     | `any`              | `[     {       bgcolor: 'RGBA(18, 105, 191, 0.5)',       data: [30, 50, 60, 70, 80, 90]     },     {       bgcolor: 'RGBA(102, 56, 240, 0.8)',       data: [40, 40, 30, 70, 60, 100]     }   ]` |
| `unit`          | `unit`         | 半径间隔数       | `number`           | `5`                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| `wh`            | --             | 画布宽高        | `[number, number]` | `[400, 400]`                                                                                                                                                                                    |
